Title: US Department of Energy grants export permit extension for Golden Pass LNG
Description: The US Department of Energy has approved an LNG export permit extension for the 18 mtpa Golden Pass LNG terminal, currently under construction in Sabine Pass, Texas. The extension provides additional time for the project to begin LNG exports.
Author: CK

Title: Feedgas pipelines restored after sabotage, five liquefaction trains now operational: Nigeria LNG
Description: The pipelines feeding gas to the 22.2 mtpa Nigeria LNG plant on Bonny Island have been restored following recent acts of sabotage and vandalism, enabling five of the six liquefaction trains at the LNG plant to operate.
Author: CK

Title: Japan’s Mitsui OSK. Lines completes first LNG bunkering in Canada
Description: Japanese shipper Mitsui OSK. Lines has completed its first LNG bunkering operation in Western North America, marking the first LNG bunkering for a car carrier in the region.
Author: CK

Title: European Commission proposes extending EU gas storage regulation until 2027
Description: The European Commission has proposed extending the EU’s gas storage regulation until 2027 to ensure energy security amid geopolitical tensions and volatile global gas markets.
Author: CK
